## Loading the Data

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda")
glimpse(house_elections)
```

##Data Set Up

```{r message = FALSE}

com_amts <- contributions %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarize(don = n(), total_don = sum(n))

ind_amts <- contributions %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarize(don = n(), total_don = sum(n))

total_dons()

```
